name: get_coin_supply
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool coinranking.
Tool description: A simple API for Cryptocurrency Prices - 28k+ users - Real-Time & Historical - Crypto Market Data - Coins - Exchanges - Free & Paid
API description: Fetch the maximum, total, and circulating supply of a cryptocurrency by its UUID.

uuid.description: The UUID of the coin for which the supply information is requested.
